definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
lit. briefcase company/dummy corporation/shell company/fly-by-night company
to be all skin and bones (idiom)/also written 皮包骨[pi2 bao1 gu3]

sentences.english: I do not remember where I put my billfold .
sentences.chinese: 我忘了我將皮包放在什麼地方。

sentences.english: This paper company does fictitious transactions exclusively.
sentences.chinese: 這個皮包公司專做買空賣空的生意。

sentences.english: Richard is only skin and bones. He should get some nourishing food.
sentences.chinese: 理查德瘦得皮包骨頭，該喫點好的食物補補了。

sentences.english: Chapter applicable to the package while clothing, handbags and so on.
sentences.chinese: 包邊章適用於服裝，皮包等。

sentences.english: Mark weaving Chapter applies to clothing, handbags and so on.
sentences.chinese: 織嘜章適用於服裝，皮包等。

sentences.english: Wrap each piece of pork fillet in pastry to enclose.
sentences.chinese: 一張生面皮包一個肉裏脊，要全部裹好，封實。

sentences.english: The next day, Samantha and I went to the Valley for Fendi bags.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，莎曼珊和我去山谷區找芬迪牌皮包。

sentences.english: Pulls a pack of Camels from her purse. Got a nasty scrape, on her elbow.
sentences.chinese: 她從皮包裏掏出一盒駱駝牌香菸。

sentences.english: In an anteroom he hastily opened his briefcase.
sentences.chinese: 在休息室裏，他迅速地打開皮包。

sentences.english: Don't believe any fly-by-night company, they all lack credibility.
sentences.chinese: 皮包公司的信譽值得我們相信嗎？
哦，等一等，我還要拿一下皮包。

sentences.english: I would like to make a single inquiry with this type of leather container.
sentences.chinese: 我想扣問一下這種式樣皮包的價值。

sentences.english: The chief engineer came to the meeting, carrying a big portfolio along.
sentences.chinese: 總工程師來到會場，隨身帶着個大皮包。

sentences.english: After getting at the officials in charge, a shell company was finally awarded the highway contract.
sentences.chinese: 勾兌了負責官員後皮包公司終於拿到了高速公路合同。

sentences.english: He turned up the collar of his top coat, with the other hand holding the attached case tightly.
sentences.chinese: 他翻上大衣領，另一隻手緊緊握住那個皮包。
